scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:js
scripts.build:sass: mkdir -p public/stylesheets; sass -q -I . -s compressed --no-source-map assets/stylesheets/app.scss public/stylesheets/application.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p public/javascripts; uglifyjs node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js node_modules/hmpo-components/all.js assets/javascripts/*.js -o public/javascripts/application.js
